name: DUBI DUBI DICE
description:
DUBI DUBI DICE

This game was made in 48h for the GMTK Jam 2022. The theme was "ROLL OF THE DICE".

You have TELEKINESIS... WOOOW!!! Are you going to use this power for the good? NOPE. You prefer to earn huge amounts of money moving dices with your mind in the casino.

CONTROLS

You can change the results of the rolls in two ways:

  • Altering the matter of the table to create small bumps (using QWERTY+ keys).
  • Giving the dice a small mental push (using the ARROW keys).

Other useful keys:

  • Press SHIFT + LEFT/RIGHT ARROWS to rotate the camera.
  • Press SHIFT + UP/DOWN ARROWS to zoom in/out.

Be careful, your time to alter the next roll decreases everytime you win (you've superpowers but you get tired too).

WARNING: Please take into account the rollover of your keyboard. Not all keyboards allow the same number of pressed keys at the same time (see also: key ghosting).

CREDITS

David (@drnlab) - Design, art and programming.
Paco (@PacoDiago) - Music. 

This game couldn't be possible without this wonderful asset:
Dice Pack Light | Packs | Unity Asset Store (by WyrmTale Games).

Fonts:
Roboto by Christian Robertson.
Nu Creactivo 2008.

All sound FX from freesound.org (CC0 license).

The one-dollar bill image is from Wikipedia. As the image is "Public Domain", you can print it as many times as you want!!!
